vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (patch_5.sol#21-26):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_5.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_5.sol#24)
